mapper.select: select id, question_type, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.course_type where id = #{id}
select id, question_type, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.course_type limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into yikaodb.course_type(question_type, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values (#{questionType}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{obj1}, #{obj2})

insert into yikaodb.course_type(question_type, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.questionType}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})

insert into yikaodb.course_type(question_type, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.questionType}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})
on duplicate key update question_type = values(question_type) , createtime = values(createtime) , updatetime = values(updatetime) , obj1 = values(obj1) , obj2 = values(obj2)
mapper.update:
update yikaodb.course_type
question_type = #{questionType},
createtime = #{createtime},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
obj1 = #{obj1},
obj2 = #{obj2},
where id = #{id}
